channel.title: Getting pkp
channel.description: Ok so like how would i make it that pest control and slayer and pking gets you like pkp which you spend at a pkp shop?

item.title: Getting pkp
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:428949”]All you would need to do is increase the amount of PK points after the player kills something.

You can also modify it so that the amount of points earned changes with the difficulty of the enemy.[/quote]
What he is saying is that he wants Pking, Slayer and Pest control to all give the same type of currency.

Look into your Pest control file and search for “point” or whatever your type of currency is. Replace it with Pk Point

do the same with your slayer.java

enjoy the help.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting pkp
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

All you would need to do is increase the amount of PK points after the player kills something.

You can also modify it so that the amount of points earned changes with the difficulty of the enemy.

Read full topic
